TO EVERYONE WHO IS SAYING THIS IS FAKE:

This is a HeroMaster upload, which means it is completely, 100% legit.  He or she has never uploaded a SINGLE torrent that was not legit.  This game is un-cracked and therefore; unplayable.  However, if you wish to download the game early (maybe because your internet is slow and you don't want to have to wait) once the crack comes out this game will be playable for you, whereas the game will not be playable for the people who DL other scene torrents from extremezone and others because they don't have the files yet! ok, i finally fixed it. it seems trying 1 crack after another jacked up some files. so the fix was to reapply the 1.0.0.2 patch to refresh all the game files, then apply the v3 crack. in my case though, i think i ended up going with the FLT crack. either way, there it is... i was able to proceed on after the car chase.  good luck all!

1. Install
2. Update patch v1.0.0.2
3. Copy Crack v3 ( of  patch v1.0.0.2)
4. Enjoy
